DOC.brief_summary: Exploring technology base tool reduce drink important . The purpose research study compare different BAC monitoring apps effect alcohol drink rating usability among young adults.This study conduct six phase : web-based in-person screening assessment ; brief counseling session day alcohol drinking session ; brief appointment day alcohol drinking session ; alcohol drinking session ; two-week field period ; follow-up appointment . Participation study last approximately two month .
DOC.criteria: Be able read/write English complete study assessment Drink alcohol regularly Test positive urine test use certain illegal drug Undergraduate student enrol University Florida Graduate student College Health Human Performance University Florida Pregnant , currently breast feed
